title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Gamification-Based Military Trauma Management Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Perform trauma patient assessment and emergency treatment procedures with 80% accuracy in simulation environments
Enhances teamwork-based decision-making skills by utilizing gamification elements (points, leveling up, missions)

Learners will write a strategic decision-making report applying three trauma management protocols (e.g., hemorrhage control, infection prevention, patient triage) under a two-week scenario with limited budget (virtual 1 million KRW) and personnel (three members), achieving an 'Excellent' grade in at least two of three evaluation criteria (clarity, realism, effectiveness).
Derives immediate corrective strategies three or more times when errors occur in real-world scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
